00033 namespace McMd
00034 {
00035 
00036    using namespace Util;
00037 
00038    /* 
00039    * Return a pointer to a instance of Species subclass className.
00040    */
00041    McMove* McMoveFactory::factory(const std::string &className) const
00042    {
00043       McMove* ptr = 0;
00044     
00045       // Try subfactories first  
00046       ptr = trySubfactories(className);
00047       if (ptr) return ptr;
00048 
00049       if (className == "HybridMdMove") {
00050          ptr = new HybridMdMove(*systemPtr_);
00051       } else 
00052       if (className == "HybridNphMdMove") {
00053          ptr = new HybridNphMdMove(*systemPtr_);
00054       } else 
00055       if (className == "MdMove") {
00056          ptr = new MdMove(*systemPtr_);
00057       } else 
00058       if (className == "DpdMove") {
00059          ptr = new DpdMove(*systemPtr_);
00060       } else 
00061       if (className == "AtomDisplaceMove") {
00062          ptr = new AtomDisplaceMove(*systemPtr_);
00063       } else
00064       if (className == "RigidDisplaceMove") {
00065          ptr = new RigidDisplaceMove(*systemPtr_);
00066       } else
00067       if (className == "EndSwapMove") {
00068          ptr = new EndSwapMove(*systemPtr_);
00069       } else 
00070       if (className == "CfbEndMove") {
00071          ptr = new CfbEndMove(*systemPtr_);
00072       } else 
00073       if (className == "CfbHomoReptationMove") {
00074          ptr = new CfbHomoReptationMove(*systemPtr_);
00075       } else 
00076       if (className == "CfbReptationMove") {
00077          ptr = new CfbReptationMove(*systemPtr_);
00078       } else 
00079       if (className == "CfbRebridgeMove") {
00080          ptr = new CfbRebridgeMove(*systemPtr_);
00081       } else 
00082       if (className == "CfbDoubleRebridgeMove") {
00083          ptr = new CfbDoubleRebridgeMove(*systemPtr_);
00084       } else 
00085       if (className == "CfbRingRebridgeMove") {
00086          ptr = new CfbRingRebridgeMove(*systemPtr_);
00087       } else 
00088       if (className == "RingTetraRebridgeMove") {
00089          ptr = new RingTetraRebridgeMove(*systemPtr_);
00090       } else 
00091       if (className == "RingOctaRebridgeMove") {
00092          ptr = new RingOctaRebridgeMove(*systemPtr_);
00093       } else 
00094       if (className == "HomopolymerSemiGrandMove") {
00095          ptr = new HomopolymerSemiGrandMove(*systemPtr_);
00096       } 
00097       return ptr;
00098    }
00099 
00100 }
00101 #endif
